text: Michael Roberds (April 29, 1950 â€“ May 30, 2022) was a Canadian actor. He starred on Fox Family's The New Addams Family as Uncle Fester. He also starred in Da Vinci's City Hall and Police Academy. He was also known for his movies roles in Elf and Hot Tub Time Machine. Roberds died from a suspected heart attack at a hospital in Langley, British Columbia on May 30, 2022, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * *TV.com : Michael Roberds *Brenna and Brittany Interview - Michael Roberds - August 1999 *Michael Roberds(Aveleyman) Category:1964 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Michael Roberds
